Package com.azure.spring.integration.core.instrumentation

Interface Instrumentation

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProcessorInstrumentation, DefaultInstrumentation, EventHubsProcessorInstrumentation, ServiceBusProcessorInstrumentation
public interface Instrumentation
Azure Instrumentation for Event Hubs or Service Bus processor.
